full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

### Title
Tailoring Services for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Uniforms and Equipment

### Reference Number
WS4610474236-Doc4610593613

### Solicitation Number
WS4610474236

### Publication and Tender Closing Dates

* **Publication Date**: Tuesday, July 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: Tuesday, August 13, 2024 at 1400 EDT

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting services for tailoring, including on-site and off-site services, to support the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) uniforms and equipment needs. The contract will support both scheduled weekly services and as-and-when-received/task authorization services.

### Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

* Minimum two (2) certified tailors available for on-site services at CFB Shilo during scheduled working hours
* Ability to accommodate off-site services for equipment maintenance, repair, or alteration
* Regular maintenance on equipment to prevent degradation and ensure optimal performance
* Effective and efficient management of inventory in support of scheduled services and as-and-when-received services

### Requirements

* The contractor must have minimum of two (2) certified tailors certified in tailoring and garments marking/marking and alterations 
*dressed bedding must also have proof that have completed the required training which includes level 1 and 2 training in time management, leadership, team work, personnel safety, apparel inventories etc (If different for level 1 will request further rest blood gaps of contracts*force enrolled reference companies)
* The contractor must have insurance 
* The supplier must maintain objective and succeed undoubtedly allowed in sessions emanig 　　　　　　　　áy-pre/classesými sens maintenance

### Tender Status
This tender is **Expired** and no longer open to bid. 

### Contact Information

For information regarding this tender, please contact:
Douglas Rachinski 
douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20340676?extsite=MjAzNDA2NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
